review_title: I worked for medair 2+ years, a d i am continuing working there as project officer, the work with Medair is great
pros: Because it is just working here to help the most volunerable people and it is working as one family
cons: Going to all the location that there is volunerable people

pros: Flexible regarding duration of employment with good HR support, and well established policies and procedures. Hi Quality work and commitment to excellence.
cons: Centralized control at international HQ, Expat heavy, seem hesitant or reluctant to promote national staff to manager level.  Dedicated to relief only as opposed to transition to development phase after relief is over.
Boring job and need to improvement
